resources: Journal App 666745539016-b5bqrpc9ebtm6s06guuvhhojq7iblr6t.apps.googleusercontent.co m //prompts Can you describe a moment from your day that stood out to you the most? Did any particular theme or thought recur in your mind throughout the day? Did you have any significant conversations today and how did they make you feel? What was a highlight in your day today? What was a challenge you faced today? If you could summarize your day in 3 words what would they be? How are you feeling today? (Select all that apply) What was the weather like today? (Select at most 2) If your day was a piece of art, which artist/artistic style would it resemble? (Select 1) %s/9
